full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 158 of 228 834 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct also be permitted to take out their binders and turn to Government Exhibit 12. THE COURT: Just a moment, jury. Any objection? MR. PAGLIUCA: No, your Honor. THE COURT: The small binder or large binder? MS. COMEY: I think it's the large binder. THE COURT: Large binder. GX-12, please. BY MS. COMEY: Q. Do you have Government Exhibit 12 in front of you? A. Yes, I do. Q. Without saying the name out loud, I'd like you to look at the portion of this exhibit that says child's name. Is that the first and last name of one of the two underage females you remember seeing at Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach residence? A. Yes, I do. Q. I'm going to refer to her as Jane, and I would ask that you do the same, please. Okay? A. Okay. Q. You can set that aside. Thank you. We won't need the binders again for the jurors for this witness. Mr. Alessi, other than Jane, what was the name of the second young female you remember seeing at Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach house? A. Her name was Virginia Roberts. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018031
